message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1300000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1250000. This is a fair compromise considering the market value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $1210000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $1210000.
